alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:09AM MST until December 27 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and bitterly cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of 2-3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Montana. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Snow and blowing snow will reduce visibility and make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Arctic air and gusty winds will create bitterly cold wind chills of 15 to 30 below zero. These cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley
